title: ODI Summit: Catherine Bracy - Lightning Talk

details.description:
Catherine Bracy, Director of International programs of Code for America, delivers a lightning talk at the ODI Summit, 2013.

The ODI Annual Summit was held on Tuesday 29th October 2013 in the Museum of London. Featuring high-profile speakers, open data luminaries and leading thinkers from business, government, technology and start-ups. The summit brought together an international line-up of acclaimed experts including world wide web inventor and ODI founder Sir Tim Berners-Lee. The summit was hosted by co-founder and chair Sir Nigel Shadbolt and CEO Gavin Starks

details.alternative_title: Content from the ODI Summit 2013 - Catherine Bracy's lightning talk.
details.content:
Catherine Bracy, Director of International programs of Code for America, delivers a lightning talk at the ODI Summit, 2013.

Catherine discusses how her organisation works with local Government in the United States, to create capacity for innovation and new ways for citizens to participate in building Government.

The ODI Annual Summit was held on Tuesday 29th October 2013 in the Museum of London. Featuring high-profile speakers, open data luminaries and leading thinkers from business, government, technology and start-ups. The summit brought together an international line-up of acclaimed experts including world wide web inventor and ODI founder Sir Tim Berners-Lee. The summit was hosted by co-founder and chair Sir Nigel Shadbolt and CEO Gavin Starks.
